member.summary: When implemented by a class, occurs when given breakpoint is toggled on/off.

member.summary: When implemented by a class, occurs when the execution position moves to the different line of code.

member.summary: When implemented by a class, occurs when user executes Goto Definition command.

member.summary: When implemented by a class, occurs when user executes Find All References command.

member.summary: When implemented by a class, occurs when user executes Find All Implementations command.

member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets allowed actions.

member.name: M:Alternet.Scripter.Integration.Wpf.IDebugEdit.ExecutionStopped(Alternet.Scripter.Debugger.ExecutionPosition)
member.summary: When implemented by a class, updates line styles when debugging is being paused.
member.param: Current execution line number and a file name.

member.name: M:Alternet.Scripter.Integration.Wpf.IDebugEdit.ClearDebugStyles(Alternet.Scripter.Debugger.ExecutionPosition)
member.summary: When implemented by a class, removes visual styles related to the step by step execution at specified position.
member.param: Current execution line number and a file name.

member.name: M:Alternet.Scripter.Integration.Wpf.IDebugEdit.ClearStackFrame(Alternet.Scripter.Debugger.StackFrame)
member.summary: When implemented by a class, removes visual styles related to the step by step execution at specified position.
member.param: StackFrame representing position to be cleared.

member.name: M:Alternet.Scripter.Integration.Wpf.IDebugEdit.SwitchStackFrame(Alternet.Scripter.Debugger.StackFrame,Alternet.Scripter.Debugger.ExecutionPosition)
member.summary: When implemented by a class, updates line styles when debugger switches to the stack frame.
member.param: Current execution line number and a file name.

member.summary: When implemented by a class, updates line styles when given breakpoint state changes.

member.summary: When implemented by a class, updates line styles when given breakpoint is being deleted.
